thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Jason
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Jason

author: Jason
title: Jason
text: The car looked a bit sad when we picked it up, 220,000+ km with a lot of dings, scratched paint and interior falling apart and the tyres were on their last journey (down to the indicator tabs), however, the car performed very well and reliably for our two week driving trip around NZ South Island. Our biggest gripe was that the radio / CD player did not function for much of the trip and started working on one speaker for the last half. The problem seemed to be with a connector at the rear of the unit. When we realised that the return to Christchurch airport was too early, they easily accommodated another drop off option.
